channel.title: networking on Carmine Zaccagnino's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in networking on Carmine Zaccagnino's Blog

item.title: Advanced Flutter Networking Part 1: Uploading a File to a REST API from Flutter Using a Multi-Part (form-data) POST Request
item.description: My Flutter book is pretty light on advanced HTTP networking topics, focusing instead on giving a more well-rounded approach that, when it comes to networking, explains how to use the http networking package for basic requests, shows an example of an app that makes GET requests, and then goes a bit more specific with Firebase.
